Title: Evil Bong 666
Writer: Charles Band, Brockton McKinney, Kent Roudebush
Actors: Mindy Robinson, Sonny Carl Davis, Robin Sydney
Plot: Your favorite stoner characters are back in EVIL BONG 666. When a blood sacrifice opens a portal to Hell, Ebee is returned to Earth where Lucy Furr, the new proprietor of her weed shop, has some sinister plans of her own.
